panels.description:
Current status of all nodes in cluster

###### Notes

+ `Blue`: constant value
+ `Fds`: File Descriptors
+ `Throttle`: flag `is_throttled`
panels.title: Nodes Status

panels.description:
Indexing rate on cluster

`ProcRate`: processing ability, which is the number of requests that Elasticsearch can handle. Estimation is based on the processed requests and processed time for these requests.
panels.title: Cluster Indexing - $cluster

panels.description:
Searching rate on cluster

`ProcRate`: processing ability, which is the number of requests that Elasticsearch can handle. Estimation is based on the processed requests and processed time for those requests.
panels.title: Cluster Search - $cluster

panels.title: Indexing ReqRate (req/s)

panels.description: Search query rate on data nodes

panels.description:
Number of JVM GC runs in second by nodes.
Threshold is 1 GC/s

panels.description:
JVM GC runtime in second by nodes
Threshold is 40ms / s
panels.title: JVM GC Runtime / s

panels.description: % CPU used by process
panels.title: Process CPU Usage

panels.description:
+ *Lucene Total*: Total heap memory used by Lucene for current index. This is the sum of other fields for primary and replica shards on this node.

+ *Stored Fields*: Heap memory used by Stored Fields (e.g., _source). This is a part of Lucene Total.. 

+ *Doc Values*: Heap memory used by Doc Values. This is a part of Lucene Total.. 

+ *Norms*: Heap memory used by Norms (normalization factors for query-time, text scoring). This is a part of Lucene Total.

+ *Terms*: (e.g., text). This is a part of Lucene Total.

+ *Points*: Heap memory used by Points (e.g., numbers, IPs, and geo data). This is a part of Lucene Total.

+ *Fixed Bitsets*: (e.g., text). This is a part of Lucene Total.

+ *Term Vectors*: Heap memory used by Term Vectors. This is a part of Lucene Total.

+ *Version Map*: Heap memory used by Versioning (e.g., updates and deletes). This is NOT a part of Lucene Total.
panels.title: Index Memory - Lucene - $name

panels.description:
+ *Query Cache*: Heap memory used by Query Cache (e.g., cached filters). This is for the same shards, but not a part of Lucene Total.. 

+ *Request Cache*: Heap memory used by Request Cache (e.g., instant aggregations). This is for the same shards, but not a part of Lucene Total.. 

+ *Fielddata*: Heap memory used by Fielddata (e.g., global ordinals or explicitly enabled fielddata on text fields). This is for the same shards, but not a part of Lucene Total.. 

+ *Index Writer*: Heap memory used by the Index Writer. This is NOT a part of Lucene Total.
panels.title: Index Memory - Elasticsearch - $name

title: Elasticsearch Cluster 13071
